availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Allen County, Kentucky, farmer. Warren County, Kentucky, native. Married to Frances Dixson Moore on November 21, 1837. Father of Hosea S. Frances Moore. Married to Malinda Blackburn Moore in Bracken County, Kentucky, on September 21, 1841. Father of John B. Moore, Asbury G. Moore, Tilman Moore, Frances J. Moore, Sidney J. Moore, Laurana N. Moore, Samantha H. Moore, Henry M. Moore, and Thomas C Moore. Resident of Washington County, Illinois, from 1839 to 1844. Farmer in Allen County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Allen County in 1850. Farmer in Allen County in 1860. Employed Robert Helburn as a farmhand in Allen County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Allen County in 1860. Justice of the Peace in Allen County in 1860 and 1862.
